  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Estudio del crecimiento de una función</string>
            <string language="en">Studying the increase or decrease of a function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren der Zunahme oder der Abnahme einer 
Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudier l'augmentation ou la diminution d'une 
fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudando o aumento ou a diminuição de uma 
função</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studiare l'aumento o la diminuzione di una 
funzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη της αύξησης ή της μείωσης μιας λειτουργίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los conceptos de monotonía, crecimiento y decrecimiento de una función real de variable real. Se aplican estos conceptos al estudios de la variación de algunas funciones elementales como lineales, polinómicas, trigonométrica y logarítmicas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concepts of monotonicity, increase and decrease of a function. These concepts are applied to the study of the variation of some elementary functions such as linear, polynomial, trigonometric and logarithmic functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mínimo</string>
            <string language="en">minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">crecimiento</string>
            <string language="en">increase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">máximo</string>
            <string language="en">maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">monotonía</string>
            <string language="en">monotonicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">decrecimiento</string>
            <string language="en">decrease</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, zum der Konzepte von monotonicity zu studieren, 
und Abnahme einer Funktion erhöhen Sie. Diese Konzepte werden 
an der Studie der Variante einiger grundlegender Funktionen wie 
lineare, polynomische, trigonometrische und logarithmische Funktionen 
angewendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations pour étudier les concepts du monotonicity, augmentez 
et diminution d'une fonction. Ces concepts sont appliqués à 
l'étude de la variation de certaines fonctions élémentaires telles 
que des fonctions linéaires, polynômes, trigonométriques et 
logarithmiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos para 
estudar os conceitos do monotonicity, aumente e diminuição de uma 
função. Estes conceitos são aplicados ao estudo da variação
de algumas funções elementares tais como funções lineares, 
polynomial, trigonometric e logarítmicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi per 
studiare i concetti del monotonicity, aumenti e diminuzione di una 
funzione. Questi concetti sono applicati allo studio sulla 
variazione di alcune funzioni elementari quali le funzioni lineari, 
polinomiali, trigonometriche e logaritmiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει τις έννοιες του monotonicity, της αύξησης και 
της μείωσης μιας λειτουργίας. Αυτές οι έννοιες εφαρμόζονται
στη μελέτη της παραλλαγής μερικών στοιχειωδών λειτουργιών όπως 
οι γραμμικές, πολυωνυμικές, trigonometric και λογαριθμικές 
λειτουργίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zunahme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">monotonicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
